title: Can we not have another Ezreal reskin please?
body: Besides Pulse Fire he has no skins which change his particles drastically, and even Pulse Fires particles are pretty underwhelming

replies.body:
Hey King Odarth! 

I wanted to pop in and explain a little bit about the though process behind selecting Ezreal as the Ace of Spades. 

When discussing a new set of 750 RP skins, we came up with the idea of playing card skins. It seemed like a pretty cool idea since we already had Jack of Hearts Twisted Fate! 

We were looking to round out the roles of champions in this skin line, and we were looking to add an ADC to the mix. We needed someone to fit the Ace of Spades (we considered Mordekaiser for this, but ultimately decided 'clubs' shape language was much stronger for his weapon.) There's an idiom - cocky as the king of spades - which implies someone is cocky or boastful, and we felt that fit Ezreal's personality pretty well. 

Why not other ADCs? We felt that other ADCs were better suited (no pun intended here) for other thematics.

I feel like this skin is too similar to his Debonair skin.  Regardless of my feelings towards Debonair (don't like the skins on anyone except Jayce and Galio), it feels too similar.  Plus i agree with everyone, he needs some cool particle effects, and Pulsefire, while different, isn't up to snuff.  And if you needed an ADC to fit the whole "cocky as the king of spades" moniker, why was {{champion:119}} not considered?  Seriously, Draven is fabulous, and you should be ashamed for not considering Draven the greatest there is.
He was considered, but we felt there were stronger thematics for him as a champion.
How do you decide whether or not it becomes 750? Do you do it to sometimes make them all the same price, or do you just feel it is the best price?
We decide scope of the skin (what kinds of things it will have/need) during production. Pricing is done last.

You guys really must reverse this process... price first, then specs.

E.g. "this concept should have updated particles since Ezreal has none anywhere other than PFE & because it's a great decision, thematically."

"This skin should be 975-1350 because Ezreal has a vast array of low-tier skins & only one super-grade skin."

You guys are doing most everything all wrong lately.

So the cards team are:

Shaco (Jungle) -- Joker
Mordekaiser (top) -- Club
Twisted Fate(mid) -- Heart
Syndra( supp) -- Diamond
Ezreal (adc) -- Spade
"1700's Debonair Ezreal" is a more fitting title for this skin than "Ace of Spades". Spades are such an underwhelming part of the skin that it's not even really noticeable :/
Everyone knows that Ezreal can only be played  ap mid, what is this adc nonsense.
shh the more they push the adc thing without touching his AP side, the more likely we avoid nerfs and continue to dominate with uber burst :D
And those low win rate AD fools keep begging for buffs! The fools!

Yet this still does not answer why he can't have any new particle effects. You all refused to give the new Syndra new effects because she "needs" a lower tier skin. Yet Ez has an army of lower tier skins and one top tier, why not give him a mid tier with new particles? How hard could it possibly be to change the color on his spells?

Funnily enough, hat was one of her biggest critiques in PBE & it went ignored. As usual.

I think this is a bit more subjective than anything else. Sure, would other champions fit this personality type? Sure! Are there better thematics for the champions you listed? Entirely possible! There may or may not be skins in development for champions you've listed. (I know, I know, you don't like hearing this, but it's the truth! D:)

Can I ask why Riot doesn't reserve the 750 tier for "one-off" skins? 


***nobody*** seems to be happy about Riot skimping on the particles for this skin line, particularly when it's such "low-hanging fruit" to have Card-themed particles. 

It just seems like a major waste.

Make 750 skins things that are novel, but not terribly strong thematically. Make the 750 skins concepts that players have a "heh, that's pretty cool" response to. Don't waste skin "lines" on the 750 tier, reserve the 750 tier for stuff that doesn't have a powerful, interesting concept behind them that can expand to more than one champion. 

*Don't* force skins that make the whole community say "whoah that's awesome!!" like the Marauder/Warden/Card skin lines into being 750 "just cuz". People want particles and express an interest in paying for particles. Please listen.

I completely agree with you. I feel like riot misses out on huge opportunities to make high quality skins by using 750 pricing for such cool themes. The 750 tier really needs to be reserved for skins that don't have to the possibility to span out into an entire skin line. They need to be reserved for the one hit wonder skins. This entire line of playing card skins has the potential to be one of the cooler skin themes riot could release but instead they are skimping out on the chance to make they skins something great.
You're right... Wow... So many cocky ADCs. Now the question is... did the players get cocky by playing the champs or did they base their champs' personality on the players? :)
I was surprised {{champion:82}} didn't get the spades skin.  Isn't his Q "Mace of Spades" ?
We did consider it, but we ultimately decided that 'clubs' has much stronger shape language for his weapon. :]

This especially stinks since he's gotten two skins practically back to back so we wont be seeing any more for the Explorer for *some* time.
They need to give Pulsefire Ezreal a permanent price reduction. Somewhere between a Legendary and Ultimate skin price. Maybe 2300 rp?

Nah, they just need to give Ezreal a full VU and that would help clean up a lot of basic skin problems.  I say that because no matter what skin he's got on his Model is just ugly. This newest one is somewhat better but still not the best they could do with him.

I definitely feel like riot is more concerned with quantity over quality. I'd rather have, say 4 skins with new particles etc in a time frame rather  than 7 recolors that don't change the feel of a character and leave me wanting more. Le sigh :(
